entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:22 a.m. ADT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 9:00 AM AST Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -2.1°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
